content.rendered:
SPRING INTO YELLOW

Kicking off early Spring trends with all shades of yellow! This is such a beautiful sunshine spring color that I can’t wait to wear. HUGE trend alert! Watch out for statement hair clips like the top gold hair clip from Versace. Another huge Spring trend I’m seeing is headbands…..especially statement headbands with pearls. 

1: Both looks are from FWRD.COM 2: Get beautiful A-list lashes with D’Lashes! Lash Extensions Appointment Click Here (By Appointment). 3: Shop D’Lashes Beauty Here. – Get the stunning high-shine lipgloss with natural looking individual lashes from D’Lashes.com! 4: Top shoes are Alexandre Vauthier from FWRD.COM. 5: Bottom bag is Jacquemus from FWRD.COM 6: Middle hair clip with pearls is LPA from Revolve.com

Happy SPRING!

LOVE DIONNE
